bookTitle: Summer's Sweet Embrace: A Sweet Romance Anthology
bookAuthors: Kim Strattford, Laurie Treacy, Christa MacDonald, Niki Mitchell, Michelle Ziegler, Jaylee Austin, Sheryl Winters, Melissa J. Crispin
Plot: Summertime love is always the sweetest. These eight sweet tales of summer romance are the perfect companion for a day at the lake or the beach. When The Sea Swallows the Sun - Kim Strattford Ocean Dust - Laurie Tracy The Beach Rose - Christa MacDonald Love's High Tide - Niki Mitchell Love's Nectar - Jaylee Austin Truly Paradise - Michelle Ziegler Above Reproach - Sheryl Winters Linger - Melissa J. Crispin
